name: AVAudioRecorder
desc: A class that provides audio recording capability in your application.

items.name: prepareToRecord
items.desc: Creates an audio file and prepares the system for recording.

items.name: record
items.desc: Starts or resumes recording.

items.name: record
items.desc: Starts recording at a specific time.

items.name: record
items.desc: Records for a specified duration of time.

items.name: record
items.desc: Starts recording at a specified time for a specified duration of time.

items.name: pause
items.desc: Pauses a recording.

items.name: stop
items.desc: Stops recording and closes the audio file.

items.name: delegate
items.desc: The delegate object for the audio recorder.

items.name: deleteRecording
items.desc: Deletes a recorded audio file.

items.name: isRecording
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the audio recorder is recording.

items.name: url
items.desc: The URL for the audio file associated with the audio recorder.

items.name: channelAssignments
items.desc: An array of AVAudioSessionChannelDescription objects associated with the recorder.

items.name: currentTime
items.desc: The time, in seconds, since the beginning of the recording.

items.name: deviceCurrentTime
items.desc: The time, in seconds, of the host device where the audio recorder is located.

items.name: settings
items.desc: The audio settings for the audio recorder.

items.name: format
items.desc: The format of the audio in the buffer.

items.name: isMeteringEnabled
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether audio-level metering is enabled.

items.name: updateMeters
items.desc: Refreshes the average and peak power values for all channels of an audio recorder.

items.name: peakPower
items.desc: Returns the peak power for a given channel, in decibels, for the sound being recorded.

items.name: averagePower
items.desc: Returns the average power for a given channel, in decibels, for the sound being recorded.
